title: [Green Suite, Bath]
description: The white marble forming the tub is veined with traces of green.  Silver spigots loose a steady stream of water into the tub at both ends.  Several silver towel racks line the wall, a series of trays with hot coals set into the wall behind them.  Small soap trays are attached to the tub at two of the corners.

The white marble forming the tub is veined with traces of green.  Silver spigots loose a steady stream of water into the tub at both ends.  Several silver towel racks line the wall, a series of trays with hot coals set into the wall behind them.  Small soap trays are attached to the tub at two of the corners.  Slender candles light the room, pushing the darkness away from the tub.
